campaign.description: This a campaign for the Mens Dress Shirts Category offering a specific banner as well as a 20% off dress shirts promotion, and a custom sort rule of product name ascending
This is a campaign that displays a landing banner, with a 25% discount on all suits and default sorting rule of top selling suits.

promotion.details: Free Ground shipping on orders over $150

promotion.name: Free Shipping on TVs
promotion.details:
Free Shipping on Televisions!
For a limited time, receive free Standard ground shipping on all Televisions!
  • Offer only valid while supplies last.
  • Offer only applies to Standard ground shipping.
  • This promotional offer may be modified or terminated at any time without notice.
HOW IT WORKS
To participate, simply add any Television to your shopping cart and Free Standard Shipping will automatically be applied. NOTE: You must select the "Standard Shipping" option to receive the discount. Otherwise, the full-expedited shipping charge will be applied. Note that this offer is only valid for orders shipped within the continental U.S. This offer applies only to the individual items; other items in your cart that are not eligible will still incur a shipping charge.
TERMS AND CONDITIONS
Offer only valid on items marked with the FREE SHIPPING Savings Alert icon. Applies only for Standard shipping. Discount does not apply to taxes, gift-wrapping or similar charges. Entire order must be shipped to a single address. Cannot be combined with any other promotional offer nor is this offer valid on previous purchases. Only applies to orders to be shipped to a valid address in the United States, excluding Alaska and Hawaii. Not available for shipments to APO/FPO addresses or P.O. boxes. Customer responsible for all shipping costs for returned merchandise. Offer not valid on cancelled or out of stock merchandise.

promotion.name: Playstation 3 Bundle $50 off
promotion.details: Save $50 on Playstation 3 Bundle, limited to 1 per order.
